venue.name: Scullers Jazz Club @ The Doubletree Guest Suites

item.description: Virtuoso flamenco guitarist and composer Juanito Pascual joins forces with two of the leading young musicians on the international jazz and world music scene - Grammy nominated Tupac Matilla (Julian Lage Group, Tekeye) and Haggai Cohen Milo (Secret Music Project, Alex Conde Quintet) to form this one of a kind trio. Juanito Pascual - Flamenco Guitar Haggai Cohen Milo - Acoustic Bass Tupac Mantilla - Percussion "One of the Hottest Flamenco Guitarists to Emerge in Recent Years" - National Public Radio "Juanito Pascual is a kind if Ry Cooder of flamenco guitar - he combines vivid colors, a rich imagination, and a yearning, never satisfied mastery of his art" - Steve Morse, (longtime writer for the Boston Globe and contributor to Bllboard and Rolling Stone"). Thursday December 1, 2011 Show: $25 ($10 with valid Student I.D.) Dinner & Show: $67 Show times: 8pm & 10pm
item.name: The Juanito Pascual New Flamenco Trio
